title: 3drotate
description: Rotates and/or translates all bricks from an AFNI dataset.

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: Input AFNI dataset, may contain a sub-brick selector list

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Sets the output dataset prefix name

ashift.title: After Shift
ashift.description: Shifts the dataset by specified distances (dx, dy, dz) in mm in x, y, z directions respectively, AFTER rotation

bshift.title: Before Shift
bshift.description: Shifts the dataset by specified distances (dx, dy, dz) in mm in x, y, z directions respectively, BEFORE rotation

rotate.title: Rotation
rotate.description: Specifies the 3D rotation angles (th1, th2, th3) about certain axes

rotparent.title: Rotation Parent Dataset
rotparent.description: Rotation and translation should be taken from the first 3dvolreg transformation found in the header of dataset 'rset'.

gridparent.title: Grid Parent Dataset
gridparent.description: Output dataset should be shifted to match the grid of dataset 'gset'. Can only be used with -rotparent.

matvec_dicom.title: DICOM Matrix/Vector File
matvec_dicom.description: Rotation and translation should be read from DICOM file 'mfile'.

matvec_order.title: Order Matrix/Vector File
matvec_order.description: Rotation and translation should be read from file 'mfile' with dataset coordinate order.

matvec_dset.title: Dataset Matrix/Vector
matvec_dset.description: Rotation and translation should be read from the .HEAD file of dataset 'mset' created by 3dTagalign.

dfile.title: Data File
dfile.description: Reads movement parameters for each sub-brick from an ASCII file 'dname'.

1Dfile.title: 1D Data File
1Dfile.description: Reads movement parameters for each sub-brick from a 1D ASCII file 'dname'.

points.title: Points
points.description: Specifies that (x,y,z) points are to be rotated instead of a dataset.

origin.title: Rotation Origin
origin.description: Specifies the rotation origin point (xo, yo, zo)

Fourier.title: Fourier
Fourier.description: Use Fourier interpolation method during transformation.

NN.title: Nearest Neighbor
NN.description: Use nearest neighbor interpolation method during transformation.

linear.title: Linear Interpolation
linear.description: Use linear interpolation (1st order polynomial) during transformation.

cubic.title: Cubic Interpolation
cubic.description: Use cubic interpolation (3rd order polynomial) during transformation.

quintic.title: Quintic Interpolation
quintic.description: Use quintic interpolation (5th order Lagrange polynomial) during transformation.

heptic.title: Heptic Interpolation
heptic.description: Use heptic interpolation (7th order Lagrange polynomial) during transformation.

Fourier_nopad.title: Fourier without Padding
Fourier_nopad.description: Use the Fourier method WITHOUT padding.

clipit.title: Clip Results
clipit.description: Clip results to input brick range [default option].

noclip.title: No Clipping
noclip.description: Do not clip results to input brick range.

zpad.title: Zero Padding
zpad.description: Zero pad around the edges by 'n' voxels during rotations.
